scripts.deploy:testnet:mockpoap: TESTNET=1 npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/MockPoapModule.js --network alfajores
scripts.deploy:testnet:poapverifier: TESTNET=1 npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/PoapVerifierModule.js --network alfajores
scripts.deploy:mainnet:poapverifier: TESTNET=0 npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/PoapVerifierModule.js --network celo
scripts.mint:testnet:poaps: TESTNET=1 npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/PoapMintModule.js --network alfajores
